On this page

  • Pros
  • Cons

general case

Pros

Category Feature Impact
Homepage
No Ads

Clean and nice layout improves the overall customer experience

Customer’s attention is not distracted
Food Delivery
Pandabox

  • attract customers to make purchase with limited time of offers

  • increase basket value

  • attract customers to try new restaurants
Speed of Delivery shorter waiting time improves the overall customer experience
Professional Riders Riders will not leave food on the floor/hang it on the door handle when asked to leave the food at doorstep. Instead, they will place it on the empty space on the shoe rack.
Pick-up
credit card promotion attract customers to link credit card
pandapro enjoys extra discount attract customers to subscribe, as pick up price sometimes cheaper than purchase in store
Subsription
Lowest subscription fee Customers who is aware of the pick-up discount are more likely to join the membership

Cons

Category Feature Impact
Food Delivery
pandapro free delivery requirement not clearly stated customers might get disappointed
choices on Chinese cuisines not as many as the competitor’s
no mix&match customer choose not to place an order when they could not meet the minimum order amount from a single restaurant
no variation on delivery fee customers who are willing to wait for longer time to pay lower delivery fee might choose to order from competitor’s app
Panda Rewards
the points could not be earned automatically after placing orders customers who used to be awarded automatically might get disappointed
